thread.title: Flight Suits for Kindergartners, Now a Reality
thread.title_full: Flight Suits for Kindergartners, Now a Reality -- The Cut

author: Véronique Hyland
title: Flight Suits for Kindergartners, Now a Reality
text: For the child who disdains Frozen -themed apparel or cutesy matching sets, consider the flight suit, small-fry edition. The brand NuNuNu, which bills itself as "a contemporary yet comfortable alternative to typical baby and children’s fashion," features pieces like biker jackets and faux -fur vests, and has been worn by toddler style icons like North West and Riley Curry. For its fall 2015 collection, the label is launching jumpsuits: both Top Gun– esque Aviator Overalls and a cozy-looking French terry version. (In my day, they just called them "onesies.")
